name: Goo'd Together
description:
A game developer for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1, with the theme "Stronger Together". The idea is to play as a cute goo and run around the platformed world sticking enemies and other things to you in order to overcome obstacles!

All code and art was created in one week. Music is 8-Bit Surf by David Renda (https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/download/8-bit-surf/568).  Although I didn't have as much time to work on it as I had hoped, I'm pretty happy with the outcome! 

Controls:

A/D to move

Arrow keys to shoot out goo arm

Space to jump
